name: alley
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a narrow road or path between buildings: She walked quickly down the alley.
Alexander Spatari/Moment/GettyImages
a path in a park or garden, especially with trees or bushes on both sides
Sergey Alimov/Moment/GettyImages

Add to word list
Add to word list
a narrow road or path between buildings, esp. between the backs of buildings: I ran down the alley and up the back stairs.
